package-manager.name: depot
package-manager.title: GNU libtool
package-manager.description: GNU libtool is a generic library support script. Libtool hides the complexity of using shared and static libraries behind a consistent, portable interface. Libtool supports building static libraries on all platforms.

item.para: Update sed dependency from 4.1.5 to 4.2.1

Apply patch for CVE-2009-3736 (http://www.cve.mitre.org/cgi-bin/cvename.cgi?name=CVE-2009-3736). ltdl.c in libltdl in GNU Libtool attempts to open a .la file in the current working directory, which allows local users to gain privileges via a Trojan horse file.
lt_dlopen with a bare "foo.la" looks in current working directory for foo.la
Update sed dependency from 4.0.9 to 4.1.5
Add support for AIX 6.1
Fix path to shell
Set shlibpath_overrides_runpath to yes for AIX
Introduce new variable, hardcode_direct_static, to determine if linking the path to the shared library creates a static dependency, rather than one that can be changed by setting $shlibpath_var
Force use of GNU sed
Create symbolic link rather than hard link for lock file when compiler does not support -c -o
Don't create modules with "lib" prefix on AIX and Tru64 UNIX
